message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's a fantastic deal for you, and I'm willing to start with a price of $180.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you consider that?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob! I'll make one more concession. I'll counteroffer at $155.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go as low as $130, Bob. I'll make one more counteroffer at $145. This is my final concession.
I appreciate your final concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. This is my final offer.
I've made it clear that I'm not willing to go below $145, Bob. I'm not interested in going any lower than that. My price remains at $145.
